Articles.Content: There is a ton of intersting mods for ksp that add telescopes and cameras, but we dont use them. So i ve got an idea for your ksp activity . You launch your telescope into orbit and observe different planets from long distance , take some cool screenshots of planets and send it into the coments . (Dont forget to quickscope the planet! )
While a pleasant idea, this does not fit the idea of the Challenges subforum.
